name: Moverio Cardboard
tagline: Easily develop VR apps for Moverio BT 200 using Google Cardboard
body:
![Logo](http://i.imgur.com/6bhOzWL.png)

### Welcome to Moverio Cardboard.
Now you can easily develop Virtual Reality apps for Epson Moverio BT 200. This project is a fork of Google Cardboard (0.4.10) optimized and preconfigured for Moverio. The SDK allows you to easily adapt your Unity 3D app or build a new VR experience from scratch.

### Features
Moverio Cardboard leverages features found in Google Cardboard 0.4.10 such as:

* e templates for you to use. Go ahead and click 'Continue to layouts' to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved.

### Cardboard Settings Preconfigured for Moverio
![Preconfigured](http://i.imgur.com/e8NRN6g.png)

### Includes Unity3D Native Android Plugin for Moverio Integration

Native plugin handles automatic switching of 2D/3D mode on Moverio. 
Or call it manually: `MoverioCardboard.SDK.SetDisplay3D (bool vrModeEnabled); `

![MoverioCardboard.jar](http://i.imgur.com/9gxmuoB.png)


### Watch Video Webinar 
Moverio Cardboard was introduced in a recent Moverio Webinar. Watch the video for step by step instructions on how to install and use it.

[Building Moverio VR/Mixed Reality Apps with Moverio Cardboard](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TxwyM-dKlUY)
![Webinar thumbnail](http://i.imgur.com/uyCWZvF.png) 


### Authors and Contributors
Original fork and Moverio Unity plugin by @hololeo. Contributions welcome!

![HoloLeo Logo](http://i.imgur.com/dMOUMas.jpg)
